numericalExperiment.rationale: To explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state (from 'A Summary of the CMIP5 Experiment Design' by Karl Taylor et al. 2008)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.ic.oc
numericalRequirement.description: Ocean Initial Conditions must represent in some measure the observed anomolies for the start date used

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.wmg_anth
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.wmg_volc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (volcanic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.sls_conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.sls_em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.nat_aer_conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosols (natural)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.anthr_aer_conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosols (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.nat_aer_em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of aerosols (natural)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.anthr_aer_em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of aerosols (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.nat_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (natural) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.anthro_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (anthropogenic) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.solar
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing solar forcing

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.land
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.NoVolc2005
numericalRequirement.description: No volcanic aerosol emissions beyond 2005

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.seaice
numericalRequirement.description: Sea ice observations forcing (unless modelled) must precede start date of simulation

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.wmg.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.aer_pre.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.wmg.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.sls.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.aer_pre.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.LandUse
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing RCP4.5 land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.1I.bc.aer_volc.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed constant background volcanic aerosol may (or may not) be specified

numericalExperiment.longName: CMIP5 Tier 1 near-term decadal experiment 1.1I - Additional Start Dates
